00052 
00053 Range::Range(MasterClientPtr &master_client,
00054              const TableIdentifier *identifier, SchemaPtr &schema,
00055              const RangeSpec *range, RangeSet *range_set,
00056              const RangeState *state)
00057     : m_bytes_read(0), m_bytes_written(0), m_master_client(master_client),
00058       m_identifier(*identifier), m_schema(schema), m_revision(0),
00059       m_latest_revision(TIMESTAMP_NULL), m_split_off_high(false),
00060       m_added_inserts(0), m_range_set(range_set), m_state(*state),
00061       m_error(Error::OK), m_dropped(false), m_capacity_exceeded_throttle(false),
00062       m_maintenance_generation(0) {
00063   AccessGroup *ag;
00064 
00065   memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
00066 
00067   if (m_state.soft_limit == 0 || m_state.soft_limit > (uint64_t)Global::range_split_size)
00068     m_state.soft_limit = Global::range_split_size;
00069 
00070   m_start_row = range->start_row;
00071   m_end_row = range->end_row;
00072 
00076   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED ||
00077       m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK) {
00078     int cmp = strcmp(m_state.split_point, m_state.old_boundary_row);
00079     if (cmp < 0)
00080       m_split_off_high = true;
00081     else
00082       HT_ASSERT(cmp > 0);
00083   }
00084   else {
00085     String split_off = Config::get_str("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.SplitOff");
00086     if (split_off == "high")
00087       m_split_off_high = true;
00088     else
00089       HT_ASSERT(split_off == "low");
00090   }
00091 
00092   m_name = format("%s[%s..%s]", identifier->name, range->start_row,
00093                   range->end_row);
00094 
00095   m_is_root = (m_identifier.id == 0 && *range->start_row == 0
00096       && !strcmp(range->end_row, Key::END_ROOT_ROW));
00097 
00098   m_column_family_vector.resize(m_schema->get_max_column_family_id() + 1);
00099 
00100   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *sag, m_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00101     ag = new AccessGroup(identifier, m_schema, sag, range);
00102     m_access_group_map[sag->name] = ag;
00103     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00104 
00105     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *scf, sag->columns)
00106       m_column_family_vector[scf->id] = ag;
00107   }
00108 
00109   if (m_is_root) {
00110     MetadataRoot metadata(m_schema);
00111     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00112   }
00113   else {
00114     MetadataNormal metadata(&m_identifier, m_end_row);
00115     load_cell_stores(&metadata);
00116   }
00117 
00118   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Range object for " << m_name << " constructed\n"
00119                << *state << HT_END;
00120 }

00126 void Range::update_schema(SchemaPtr &schema) {
00127   ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00128 
00129   vector<Schema::AccessGroup*> new_access_groups;
00130   AccessGroup *ag;
00131   AccessGroupMap::iterator ag_iter;
00132   size_t max_column_family_id = schema->get_max_column_family_id();
00133 
00134   // only update schema if there is more recent version
00135   if(schema->get_generation() <= m_schema->get_generation())
00136     return;
00137 
00138   // resize column family vector if needed
00139   if (max_column_family_id > m_column_family_vector.size()-1)
00140     m_column_family_vector.resize(max_column_family_id+1);
00141 
00142   // update all existing access groups & create new ones as needed
00143   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *s_ag, schema->get_access_groups()) {
00144     if( (ag_iter = m_access_group_map.find(s_ag->name)) !=
00145         m_access_group_map.end()) {
00146       ag_iter->second->update_schema(schema, s_ag);
00147       foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *s_cf, s_ag->columns) {
00148         if (s_cf->deleted == false)
00149           m_column_family_vector[s_cf->id] = ag_iter->second;
00150       }
00151     }
00152     else {
00153       new_access_groups.push_back(s_ag);
00154     }
00155   }
00156 
00157   // create new access groups
00158   RangeSpec range_spec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00159   foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *s_ag, new_access_groups) {
00160     ag = new AccessGroup(&m_identifier, schema, s_ag, &range_spec);
00161     m_access_group_map[s_ag->name] = ag;
00162     m_access_group_vector.push_back(ag);
00163 
00164     foreach(Schema::ColumnFamily *s_cf, s_ag->columns) {
00165       if (s_cf->deleted == false)
00166         m_column_family_vector[s_cf->id] = ag;
00167     }
00168   }
00169 
00170   // TODO: remove deleted access groups
00171   m_schema = schema;
00172   return;
00173 }
00174 
00178 void Range::load_cell_stores(Metadata *metadata) {
00179   AccessGroup *ag;
00180   CellStorePtr cellstore;
00181   uint32_t csid;
00182   const char *base, *ptr, *end;
00183   std::vector<String> csvec;
00184   String ag_name;
00185   String files;
00186   String file_str;
00187   bool need_update;
00188 
00189   metadata->reset_files_scan();
00190 
00191   while (metadata->get_next_files(ag_name, files)) {
00192     csvec.clear();
00193     need_update = false;
00194 
00195     if ((ag = m_access_group_map[ag_name]) == 0) {
00196       HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized access group name '%s' found in METADATA for "
00197                 "table '%s'", ag_name.c_str(), m_identifier.name);
00198       HT_ABORT;
00199     }
00200 
00201     ptr = base = (const char *)files.c_str();
00202     end = base + strlen(base);
00203     while (ptr < end) {
00204 
00205       while (*ptr != ';' && ptr < end)
00206         ptr++;
00207 
00208       file_str = String(base, ptr-base);
00209       boost::trim(file_str);
00210 
00211       if (file_str[0] == '#') {
00212         ++ptr;
00213         base = ptr;
00214         need_update = true;
00215         continue;
00216       }
00217 
00218       if (file_str != "")
00219         csvec.push_back(file_str);
00220 
00221       ++ptr;
00222       base = ptr;
00223     }
00224 
00225     files = "";
00226 
00227     for (size_t i=0; i<csvec.size(); i++) {
00228 
00229       files += csvec[i] + ";\n";
00230 
00231       HT_INFOF("Loading CellStore %s", csvec[i].c_str());
00232 
00233       if (!extract_csid_from_path(csvec[i], &csid)) {
00234         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_BAD_CELLSTORE_FILENAME,
00235                   "Unable to extract cell store ID from path '%s'",
00236                   csvec[i].c_str());
00237       }
00238 
00239       cellstore = CellStoreFactory::open(csvec[i], m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00240 
00241       if (cellstore->get_revision() > m_latest_revision)
00242         m_latest_revision = cellstore->get_revision();
00243 
00244       ag->add_cell_store(cellstore, csid);
00245     }
00246 
00252   }
00253 
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 bool Range::extract_csid_from_path(String &path, uint32_t *csidp) {
00258   const char *base;
00259 
00260   if ((base = strrchr(path.c_str(), '/')) == 0 || strncmp(base, "/cs", 3))
00261     *csidp = 0;
00262   else
00263     *csidp = atoi(base+3);
00264 
00265   return true;
00266 }

00268 
00272 void Range::add(const Key &key, const ByteString value) {
00273   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"key="<< key <<" value='";
00274   const uint8_t *p;
00275   size_t len = value.decode_length(&p);
00276   _out_ << format_bytes(20, p, len) << HT_END;
00277 
00278   if (key.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00279     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); ++i)
00280       m_access_group_vector[i]->add(key, value);
00281   }
00282   else
00283     m_column_family_vector[key.column_family_code]->add(key, value);
00284 
00285   if (key.flag == FLAG_INSERT)
00286     m_added_inserts++;
00287   else
00288     m_added_deletes[key.flag]++;
00289 
00290   if (key.revision > m_revision)
00291     m_revision = key.revision;
00292 }

00295 CellListScanner *Range::create_scanner(ScanContextPtr &scan_ctx) {
00296   bool return_deletes = scan_ctx->spec ? scan_ctx->spec->return_deletes : false;
00297   MergeScanner *mscanner = new MergeScanner(scan_ctx, return_deletes);
00298   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00299 
00300   {
00301     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00302     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00303   }
00304 
00305   try {
00306     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); ++i) {
00307       if (ag_vector[i]->include_in_scan(scan_ctx))
00308         mscanner->add_scanner(ag_vector[i]->create_scanner(scan_ctx));
00309     }
00310   }
00311   catch (Exception &e) {
00312     delete mscanner;
00313     HT_THROW2(e.code(), e, "");
00314   }
00315 
00316   return mscanner;
00317 }

00320 uint64_t Range::disk_usage() {
00321   ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00322   uint64_t usage = 0;
00323   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00324     usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00325   return usage;
00326 }

00329 
00330 bool Range::need_maintenance() {
00331   ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00332   bool needed = false;
00333   int64_t mem, disk, disk_total = 0;
00334   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); ++i) {
00335     m_access_group_vector[i]->space_usage(&mem, &disk);
00336     disk_total += disk;
00337     if (mem >= Global::access_group_max_mem) {
00338       m_access_group_vector[i]->set_compaction_bit();
00339       needed = true;
00340     }
00341   }
00342   if (m_identifier.id == 0) {
00343     if (Global::range_metadata_split_size != 0 &&
00344         disk_total >= (int64_t)Global::range_metadata_split_size)
00345       needed = true;
00346   }
00347   else if (disk_total >= Global::range_split_size)
00348     needed = true;
00349   return needed;
00350 }
00351 
00352 
00353 bool Range::cancel_maintenance() {
00354   return m_dropped ? true : false;
00355 }

00357 
00358 Range::MaintenanceData *Range::get_maintenance_data(ByteArena &arena) {
00359   MaintenanceData *mdata = (MaintenanceData *)arena.alloc( sizeof(MaintenanceData) );
00360   AccessGroup::MaintenanceData **tailp = 0;
00361   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00362   uint64_t size=0;
00363   int64_t starting_maintenance_generation;
00364 
00365   {
00366     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00367     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00368   }
00369 
00370   memset(mdata, 0, sizeof(MaintenanceData));
00371   mdata->range = this;
00372   mdata->table_id = m_identifier.id;
00373 
00374   // record starting maintenance generation
00375   {
00376     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00377     starting_maintenance_generation = m_maintenance_generation;
00378     mdata->bytes_read = m_bytes_read;
00379     mdata->bytes_written = m_bytes_written;
00380     mdata->state = m_state.state;
00381   }
00382 
00383   for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++) {
00384     if (mdata->agdata == 0) {
00385       mdata->agdata = ag_vector[i]->get_maintenance_data(arena);
00386       tailp = &mdata->agdata;
00387     }
00388     else {
00389       (*tailp)->next = ag_vector[i]->get_maintenance_data(arena);
00390       tailp = &(*tailp)->next;
00391     }
00392     size += (*tailp)->disk_used;
00393   }
00394 
00395   if (tailp)
00396     (*tailp)->next = 0;
00397 
00398   if (size > (uint64_t)Global::range_maximum_size) {
00399     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00400     if (starting_maintenance_generation == m_maintenance_generation)
00401       m_capacity_exceeded_throttle = true;
00402   }
00403 
00404   mdata->busy = m_maintenance_guard.in_progress();
00405 
00406   return mdata;
00407 }

00409 
00410 void Range::split() {
00411   RangeMaintenanceGuard::Activator activator(m_maintenance_guard);
00412   String old_start_row;
00413 
00414   HT_ASSERT(!m_is_root);
00415 
00416   try {
00417 
00418     switch (m_state.state) {
00419 
00420     case (RangeState::STEADY):
00421       split_install_log();
00422 
00423     case (RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED):
00424       split_compact_and_shrink();
00425 
00426     case (RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK):
00427       split_notify_master();
00428 
00429     }
00430 
00431   }
00432   catch (Exception &e) {
00433     if (e.code() == Error::CANCELLED || cancel_maintenance())
00434       return;
00435     throw;
00436   }
00437 
00438   {
00439     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00440     m_capacity_exceeded_throttle = false;
00441     m_maintenance_generation++;
00442   }
00443 
00444   HT_INFOF("Split Complete.  New Range end_row=%s", m_start_row.c_str());
00445 }
00446 
00447 
00448 
00451 void Range::split_install_log() {
00452   std::vector<String> split_rows;
00453   char md5DigestStr[33];
00454   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00455 
00456   {
00457     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00458     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00459   }
00460 
00461   if (cancel_maintenance())
00462     HT_THROW(Error::CANCELLED, "");
00463 
00464   for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00465     ag_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, false);
00466 
00471   if (split_rows.size() < ag_vector.size()) {
00472     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00473       ag_vector[i]->get_split_rows(split_rows, true);
00474   }
00475   sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00476 
00491   if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00492     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00493     m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00494     if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00495       split_rows.clear();
00496       for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00497         ag_vector[i]->get_cached_rows(split_rows);
00498       if (split_rows.size() > 0) {
00499         sort(split_rows.begin(), split_rows.end());
00500         m_split_row = split_rows[split_rows.size()/2];
00501         if (m_split_row < m_start_row || m_split_row >= m_end_row) {
00502           m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00503           HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00504                     "(a) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00505                     m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00506         }
00507       }
00508       else {
00509         m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00510         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00511                   "(b) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00512                    m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00513       }
00514     }
00515   }
00516   else {
00517     m_error = Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW;
00518     HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_ROW_OVERFLOW,
00519               "(c) Unable to determine split row for range %s[%s..%s]",
00520               m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
00521   }
00522 
00523   m_state.set_split_point(m_split_row);
00524 
00528   md5_string(m_state.split_point, md5DigestStr);
00529   md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00530   m_state.set_transfer_log(Global::log_dir + "/" + md5DigestStr);
00531 
00532   // Create transfer log dir
00533   try {
00534     Global::log_dfs->rmdir(m_state.transfer_log);
00535     Global::log_dfs->mkdirs(m_state.transfer_log);
00536   }
00537   catch (Exception &e) {
00538     HT_ERRORF("Problem creating log directory '%s': %s",
00539               m_state.transfer_log, e.what());
00540     HT_ABORT;
00541   }
00542 
00546   {
00547     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00548     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00549     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00550       ag_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00551     m_split_log = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00552   }
00553 
00554   if (m_split_off_high)
00555     m_state.set_old_boundary_row(m_end_row);
00556   else
00557     m_state.set_old_boundary_row(m_start_row);
00558 
00562   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED;
00563   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00564     try {
00565       Global::range_log->log_split_start(m_identifier,
00566           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00567       break;
00568     }
00569     catch (Exception &e) {
00570       if (i<3) {
00571         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00572         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00573         continue;
00574       }
00575       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED meta log entry for %s "
00576                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00577       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00578     }
00579   }
00580 
00581   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00582     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-1");
00583 
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00587 void Range::split_compact_and_shrink() {
00588   int error;
00589   String old_start_row = m_start_row;
00590   String old_end_row = m_end_row;
00591   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00592 
00593   {
00594     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00595     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00596   }
00597 
00598   if (cancel_maintenance())
00599     HT_THROW(Error::CANCELLED, "");
00600 
00604   {
00605     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00606       if (ag_vector[i]->compaction_initiated())
00607         ag_vector[i]->run_compaction(true);
00608   }
00609 
00610   try {
00611     String files;
00612     String metadata_key_str;
00613     KeySpec key;
00614 
00615     TableMutatorPtr mutator = Global::metadata_table->create_mutator();
00616 
00617     // For new range with existing end row, update METADATA entry with new
00618     // 'StartRow' column.
00619     metadata_key_str = String("") + (uint32_t)m_identifier.id + ":" + m_end_row;
00620     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00621     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00622     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00623     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00624     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00625     mutator->set(key, (uint8_t *)m_state.split_point,
00626                  strlen(m_state.split_point));
00627     if (m_split_off_high) {
00628       key.column_family = "Files";
00629       for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++) {
00630         key.column_qualifier = ag_vector[i]->get_name();
00631         key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(ag_vector[i]->get_name());
00632         ag_vector[i]->get_file_list(files, false);
00633         if (files != "")
00634           mutator->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00635       }
00636     }
00637 
00638     // For new range whose end row is the split point, create a new METADATA
00639     // entry
00640     metadata_key_str = format("%u:%s", m_identifier.id, m_state.split_point);
00641     key.row = metadata_key_str.c_str();
00642     key.row_len = metadata_key_str.length();
00643     key.column_qualifier = 0;
00644     key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00645 
00646     key.column_family = "StartRow";
00647     mutator->set(key, old_start_row.c_str(), old_start_row.length());
00648 
00649     key.column_family = "Files";
00650     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++) {
00651       key.column_qualifier = ag_vector[i]->get_name();
00652       key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(ag_vector[i]->get_name());
00653       ag_vector[i]->get_file_list(files, m_split_off_high);
00654       if (files != "")
00655         mutator->set(key, (uint8_t *)files.c_str(), files.length());
00656     }
00657     if (m_split_off_high) {
00658       key.column_qualifier = 0;
00659       key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00660       key.column_family = "Location";
00661       mutator->set(key, Global::location.c_str(), Global::location.length());
00662     }
00663 
00664     mutator->flush();
00665 
00666   }
00667   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00668     // TODO: propagate exception
00669     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"Problem updating METADATA after split (new_end="
00670         << m_state.split_point <<", old_end="<< m_end_row <<") "<< e << HT_END;
00671     // need to unblock updates and then return error
00672     HT_ABORT;
00673   }
00674 
00678   {
00679     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00680     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_scans(m_scan_barrier);
00681 
00682     // Shrink access groups
00683     if (m_split_off_high)
00684       HT_ASSERT(m_range_set->change_end_row(m_end_row, m_state.split_point));
00685     {
00686       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00687       String split_row = m_state.split_point;
00688 
00689       // Shrink access groups
00690       if (m_split_off_high)
00691         m_end_row = m_state.split_point;
00692       else
00693         m_start_row = m_state.split_point;
00694 
00695       m_name = String(m_identifier.name) + "[" + m_start_row + ".." + m_end_row
00696         + "]";
00697       m_split_row = "";
00698       for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00699         ag_vector[i]->shrink(split_row, m_split_off_high);
00700 
00701       // Close and uninstall split log
00702       if ((error = m_split_log->close()) != Error::OK) {
00703         HT_ERRORF("Problem closing split log '%s' - %s",
00704                   m_split_log->get_log_dir().c_str(), Error::get_text(error));
00705       }
00706       m_split_log = 0;
00707     }
00708   }
00709 
00713   m_state.state = RangeState::SPLIT_SHRUNK;
00714   if (m_split_off_high) {
00716     {
00717       char md5DigestStr[33];
00718       String table_dir, range_dir;
00719 
00720       md5_string(m_end_row.c_str(), md5DigestStr);
00721       md5DigestStr[24] = 0;
00722       table_dir = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + m_identifier.name;
00723 
00724       {
00725         ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00726         foreach(Schema::AccessGroup *ag, m_schema->get_access_groups()) {
00727           // notice the below variables are different "range" vs. "table"
00728           range_dir = table_dir + "/" + ag->name + "/" + md5DigestStr;
00729           Global::dfs->mkdirs(range_dir);
00730         }
00731       }
00732     }
00733 
00734   }
00735 
00736   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00737     try {
00738       Global::range_log->log_split_shrunk(m_identifier,
00739           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00740       break;
00741     }
00742     catch (Exception &e) {
00743       if (i<3) {
00744         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00745         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00746         continue;
00747       }
00748       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_SHRUNK meta log entry for %s "
00749                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00750       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00751     }
00752   }
00753 
00754   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00755     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-2");
00756 
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void Range::split_notify_master() {
00761   RangeSpec range;
00762   int64_t soft_limit = (int64_t)m_state.soft_limit;
00763 
00764   if (cancel_maintenance())
00765     HT_THROW(Error::CANCELLED, "");
00766 
00767   if (m_split_off_high) {
00768     range.start_row = m_end_row.c_str();
00769     range.end_row = m_state.old_boundary_row;
00770   }
00771   else {
00772     range.start_row = m_state.old_boundary_row;
00773     range.end_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00774   }
00775 
00776   // update the latest generation, this should probably be protected
00777   {
00778     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00779     m_identifier.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00780   }
00781 
00782   HT_INFOF("Reporting newly split off range %s[%s..%s] to Master",
00783            m_identifier.name, range.start_row, range.end_row);
00784 
00785   if (soft_limit < Global::range_split_size) {
00786     soft_limit *= 2;
00787     if (soft_limit > Global::range_split_size)
00788       soft_limit = Global::range_split_size;
00789   }
00790 
00791   m_master_client->report_split(&m_identifier, range,
00792                                 m_state.transfer_log, soft_limit);
00793 
00799   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00800     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-3");
00801 
00802   m_state.soft_limit = soft_limit;
00803 
00807   for (int i=0; true; i++) {
00808     try {
00809       Global::range_log->log_split_done(m_identifier,
00810           RangeSpec(m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str()), m_state);
00811       break;
00812     }
00813     catch (Exception &e) {
00814       if (i<2) {
00815         HT_ERRORF("%s - %s", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00816         poll(0, 0, 5000);
00817         continue;
00818       }
00819       HT_ERRORF("Problem writing SPLIT_DONE meta log entry for %s "
00820                 "split-point='%s'", m_name.c_str(), m_state.split_point);
00821       HT_FATAL_OUT << e << HT_END;
00822     }
00823   }
00824 
00825   m_state.clear();
00826 
00827   if (Global::failure_inducer)
00828     Global::failure_inducer->maybe_fail("split-4");
00829 }
00830 
00831 
00832 void Range::compact(bool major) {
00833   RangeMaintenanceGuard::Activator activator(m_maintenance_guard);
00834 
00835   try {
00836     run_compaction(major);
00837   }
00838   catch (Exception &e) {
00839     if (e.code() == Error::CANCELLED || cancel_maintenance())
00840       return;
00841     throw;
00842   }
00843 
00844   {
00845     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00846     m_capacity_exceeded_throttle = false;
00847     m_maintenance_generation++;
00848   }
00849 }
00850 
00851 
00852 void Range::run_compaction(bool major) {
00853   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00854 
00855   {
00856     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00857     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00858   }
00859 
00860   {
00861     Barrier::ScopedActivator block_updates(m_update_barrier);
00862     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00863     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++) {
00864       if (major || ag_vector[i]->needs_compaction())
00865         ag_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00866     }
00867   }
00868 
00869   for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00870     if (ag_vector[i]->compaction_initiated())
00871       ag_vector[i]->run_compaction(major);
00872 }
00873 
00874 
00875 void Range::purge_index_data(int64_t scanner_generation) {
00876   RangeMaintenanceGuard::Activator activator(m_maintenance_guard);
00877   AccessGroupVector  ag_vector(0);
00878 
00879   {
00880     ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00881     ag_vector = m_access_group_vector;
00882   }
00883 
00884   try {
00885     for (size_t i=0; i<ag_vector.size(); i++)
00886       ag_vector[i]->purge_index_data(scanner_generation);
00887   }
00888   catch (Exception &e) {
00889     if (e.code() == Error::CANCELLED || cancel_maintenance())
00890       return;
00891     throw;
00892   }
00893 }
00894 
00895 
00899 void Range::recovery_finalize() {
00900 
00901   if (m_state.state == RangeState::SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED) {
00902     CommitLogReaderPtr commit_log_reader =
00903         new CommitLogReader(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00904     replay_transfer_log(commit_log_reader.get());
00905     commit_log_reader = 0;
00906 
00907     // re-initiate compaction
00908     for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00909       m_access_group_vector[i]->initiate_compaction();
00910 
00911     m_split_log = new CommitLog(Global::dfs, m_state.transfer_log);
00912     m_split_row = m_state.split_point;
00913     HT_INFOF("Restored range state to SPLIT_LOG_INSTALLED (split point='%s' "
00914              "split log='%s')", m_state.split_point, m_state.transfer_log);
00915   }
00916 
00917   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++)
00918     m_access_group_vector[i]->recovery_finalize();
00919 }
00920 
00921 
00922 void Range::get_statistics(RangeStat *stat) {
00923   ScopedLock lock(m_schema_mutex);
00924   uint64_t collisions = 0;
00925   uint64_t cached = 0;
00926   uint64_t disk_usage = 0;
00927   uint64_t memory_usage = 0;
00928 
00929   stat->added_inserts = m_added_inserts;
00930   stat->added_deletes[0] = m_added_deletes[0];
00931   stat->added_deletes[1] = m_added_deletes[1];
00932   stat->added_deletes[2] = m_added_deletes[2];
00933 
00934   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); i++) {
00935     collisions += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_collision_count();
00936     cached += m_access_group_vector[i]->get_cached_count();
00937     disk_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->disk_usage();
00938     memory_usage += m_access_group_vector[i]->memory_usage();
00939   }
00940 
00941   stat->collided_cells = collisions;
00942   stat->cached_cells = cached;
00943   stat->disk_usage = disk_usage;
00944   stat->memory_usage = memory_usage;
00945 
00946 
00947 
00948   {
00949     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00950 
00951     stat->table_identifier = m_identifier;
00952 
00953     RangeSpec spec;
00954     // these may change during a shrink
00955     spec.start_row = m_start_row.c_str();
00956     spec.end_row = m_end_row.c_str();
00957 
00958     stat->range_spec = spec;
00959   }
00960 }
00961 
00962 
00963 void Range::lock() {
00964   m_schema_mutex.lock();
00965   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); ++i)
00966     m_access_group_vector[i]->lock();
00967   m_revision = 0;
00968 }
00969 
00970 
00971 void Range::unlock() {
00972 
00973   {
00974     ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00975     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
00976       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
00977   }
00978 
00979   for (size_t i=0; i<m_access_group_vector.size(); ++i)
00980     m_access_group_vector[i]->unlock();
00981 
00982   m_schema_mutex.unlock();
00983 }
00984 
00985 
00986 void Range::replay_transfer_log(CommitLogReader *commit_log_reader) {
00987   BlockCompressionHeaderCommitLog header;
00988   const uint8_t *base, *ptr, *end;
00989   size_t len;
00990   ByteString key, value;
00991   Key key_comps;
00992   size_t nblocks = 0;
00993   size_t count = 0;
00994   TableIdentifier table_id;
00995 
00996   m_revision = 0;
00997 
00998   try {
00999 
01000     while (commit_log_reader->next(&base, &len, &header)) {
01001 
01002       ptr = base;
01003       end = base + len;
01004 
01005       table_id.decode(&ptr, &len);
01006 
01007       if (strcmp(m_identifier.name, table_id.name))
01008         HT_THROWF(Error::RANGESERVER_CORRUPT_COMMIT_LOG,
01009                   "Table name mis-match in split log replay \"%s\" != \"%s\"",
01010                   m_identifier.name, table_id.name);
01011 
01012       while (ptr < end) {
01013         key.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
01014         key_comps.load(key);
01015         ptr += key_comps.length;
01016         value.ptr = (uint8_t *)ptr;
01017         ptr += value.length();
01018         add(key_comps, value);
01019         count++;
01020       }
01021       nblocks++;
01022     }
01023 
01024     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
01025       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
01026 
01027     {
01028       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
01029       HT_INFOF("Replayed %d updates (%d blocks) from split log '%s' into "
01030                "%s[%s..%s]", (int)count, (int)nblocks,
01031                commit_log_reader->get_log_dir().c_str(),
01032                m_identifier.name, m_start_row.c_str(), m_end_row.c_str());
01033     }
01034 
01035     m_added_inserts = 0;
01036     memset(m_added_deletes, 0, 3*sizeof(int64_t));
01037 
01038   }
01039   catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
01040     HT_ERRORF("Problem replaying split log - %s '%s'",
01041               Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
01042     if (m_revision > m_latest_revision)
01043       m_latest_revision = m_revision;
01044     throw;
01045   }
01046 }
01047 
01048 
01049 int64_t Range::get_scan_revision() {
01050   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
01051   return m_latest_revision;
01052 }
